医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现肾细胞更新的新机制德克萨斯大学达拉斯分校的科学家在肾细胞中发现了一种以前未知的“管家”过程，该过程会排出不需要的内容，从而使细胞恢复活力并保持功能和健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Scientists-Discover-New-Mechanism-for-Kidney-Cell-Renewal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Scientists-Discover-New-Mechanism-for-Kidney-Cell-Renewal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=388b7415-3bb8-4364-949f-110dda12465b Fri, 14 Jul 2023 09:22:00 -0400 Scientists discover new mechanism for kidney cell renewal
睡眠质量受损与老年肥胖者的不良健康参数有关肥胖老年人睡眠质量与健康参数之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Impaired-sleep-quality-linked-to-adverse-health-parameters-in-older-individuals-with-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Impaired-sleep-quality-linked-to-adverse-health-parameters-in-older-individuals-with-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ae847ae-4ff1-40d8-9297-292542d16f07 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 07:35:00 -0400 Impaired sleep quality linked to adverse health parameters in older individuals with obesity
揭示关键防御者：PLSCR1 被确定为 COVID-19 免疫中的有效抗 SARS-CoV-2 因子研究人员确定了磷脂扰乱酶 1 (PLSCR1) 的抗 SARS-CoV-2 功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Unveiling-the-key-defender-PLSCR1-identified-as-a-potted-anti-SARS-CoV-2-factor-in-COVID-19-免疫.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Unveiling-the-key-defender-PLSCR1-identified-as-a-potted-anti-SARS-CoV-2-factor-in-COVID-19-免疫.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84a0d291-82e3-4450-a89a-9a2f59e70102 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 07:20:00 -0400 Unveiling the key defender: PLSCR1 identified as a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 factor in COVID-19 immunity
耐药性的隐藏因素：病原体多样性如何驱动抗生素反应研究人员旨在了解宿主内微生物多样性对抗菌素耐药性的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/The-hidden-factors-of-resistance-how-pathogen-diversity-drives-antibiotic-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/The-hidden-factors-of-resistance-how-pathogen-diversity-drives-antibiotic-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5afa79f-9158-4e53-9128-34b461f23cb2 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 06:56:00 -0400 The hidden factors of resistance: how pathogen diversity drives antibiotic response
新冠诉讼和媒体报道的结合如何使错误信息不断涌现最近，公共卫生问题在法庭上取得了胜利。又有一天。又有一天。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/How-a-combination-of-covid-lawsuits-and-media-coverage-keeps-misinformation-churning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/How-a-combination-of-covid-lawsuits-and-media-coverage-keeps-misinformation-churning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ced7a97d-1b10-416b-a60f-2e29c4ee4f9d Fri, 14 Jul 2023 06:43:00 -0400 How a combination of covid lawsuits and media coverage keeps misinformation churning
削减蒙大拿州医疗补助等候名单的计划得到了两党的欢呼。然后否决。蒙大拿州参议员贝基·比尔德 (Becky Beard) 认为，她已经找到了解决方案，解决了那些无力支付费用的蒙大拿人的辅助生活护理选择短缺的问题——她在为母亲寻找合适的地方时意识到了这一短缺。居住。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/A-plan-to-cut-Montanae28099s-Medicaid-waiting-list-was-met-with-bipartisan-cheers-Then-a-veto.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/A-plan-to-cut-Montanae28099s-Medicaid-waiting-list-was-met-with-bipartisan-cheers-Then-a-veto.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=381675e1-ed51-4bff-9b94-2d48d0e72853 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 06:40:11 -0400 A plan to cut Montana’s Medicaid waiting list was met with bipartisan cheers. Then a veto.
新研究揭示肥大细胞在过敏相关回避行为中的惊人作用研究人员表明，肥大细胞和 IgE 是抗原特异性回避的关键协调者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/New-study-reveals-mast-cells-surprising-role-in-allergy-lated-avoidance-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/New-study-reveals-mast-cells-surprising-role-in-allergy-lated-avoidance-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4417a61d-03bc-45e7-87f1-c6124f6b369c Fri, 14 Jul 2023 06:37:00 -0400 New study reveals mast cells' surprising role in allergy-related avoidance behavior
新结核病疫苗对印度的潜在健康和经济影响一份新的预印本讨论了针对青少年和成人的新型结核疫苗如何缓解这一问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/The-potential-health-and-economic-impact-of-new-tuberculosis-vaccines-in-India.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/The-potential-health-and-economic-impact-of-new-tuberculosis-vaccines-in-India.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70629905-1ce0-456f-99db-6f549369aab8 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 06:09:00 -0400 The potential health and economic impact of new tuberculosis vaccines in India
